item.title: Predictive Analytics
item.description: Predictive Analytics At AIT we use historical data, statistical algorithms and machine learning techniques to predict future events.

item.title: Predictive Maintenance
item.description: Predictive Maintenance Predictive maintenance refers to a holistic approach to monitoring the history and condition of industrial equipment in order to determine when maintenance activities should be carried out.

item.title: Home
item.description: Network Analysis Network Security and Anomaly Detection AI can largely increase the detection accuracy of attacks and other threats flowing through the network and impacting end devices, without sacrificing the robustness of the analysis (i.

item.title: Consumer Protection
item.description: Consumer Protection Prevention is a key instrument in fighting cybercrime. Technological solutions that actively inform, enlighten and protect consumers and their representative bodies are an important addition to preventive measures both in terms of capacity and speed in fighting illegitimate subscription services, counterfeit goods and fraudulent e-commerce offerings.

item.title: Public Safety
item.description: Public Safety AIT provides solutions for the forensic analysis of audio-video material, with features that address the requirements of end users including service providers and stakeholders such as law enforcement agencies (LEAs).

item.title: About
item.description: About About DSAI AIT’s Data Science & Artificial Intelligence (DSAI) unit offers Data Science research services for scalable Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications.

item.title: Cultural Data Science
item.description: Cultural Data Science Advancing digital methods for the management and analysis of cultural heritage Data is becoming an increasingly important resource in Cultural Heritage.

item.title: Industrial Data Science
item.description: Industrial Data Science DSAI investigates and applies data analytics approaches to gain new insights in to industrial processes The digital transformation provides industries with unparalleled opportunities for value creation.

item.title: Public Security
item.description: Public Security DSAI makes the internet safer for European citizens The Internet is an unprecedented platform for communication, information and commerce.

item.title: Research | AI Audio
item.description: Artificial Intelligence Audio Audio perception is one of the central research fields in artificial intelligence.

item.title: Research | Applied AI
item.description: Applied Artificial Intelligence Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a complex and diverse research field, ranging from technical to ethical and legal aspects.

item.title: Research | Explainable AI
item.description: Explainable Artificial Intelligence Explainable AI, or better said, interpretable Machine Learning supports us in understanding the decisions made by our complex models, when and why the model might fail or succeed, and how we can improve our model’s performance by having gained more insight into its learning structure and the input data.

item.title: Research | Multimodal AI
item.description: Multi-modal Artificial Intelligence The definition of intelligence is diverse, and so is the definition of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Research | NLP
item.description: Natural Language Processing Language understanding is a cognitive task at the highest level and a major discipline of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Team
item.description: Team The DSAI team provides expertise for each step in a data science workflow.
